circular.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a printed advertisement, notice etc that is sent to lots of people at the same time
circular.translation[2].definitions[0].d: an official letter or advertisement sent to a lot of people
circular.translation[2].definitions[0].e: The government’s instructions were issued to local authorities via circulars.
a circular letter sent out by one insurance company, urging people to ‘Act Now And Beat The Tax Man’
